item.title: Is there a truly light-independent ecosystem?
item.author: Author
item.description: Oxygen is one of those things that nobody thinks about unless they either don’t have it or they’re a scientist. Either way, once you do start to think about oxygen, its usually not long until you start thinking there’s nothing more important in the universe.
